About Koki Holdings (formerly known as Hitachi Koki company): Hitachi Koki Co. Ltd, established in the Year 1948 in Japan, maintains its position as one of the world's leading power tool manufacturers.
Now rebranded as "HiKOKI", the company's India arm has been operating since 1996 and is the largest and fastest growing subsidiary in Asia (after Japan).
It has more than 70 subsidiary Companies in all major countries, including Hitachi Koki India Pvt Ltd (HKI).

HKI is the 2nd biggest player in the Power Tools business in India and it offers innovative, high-performance, and high-quality products and services that result in a high level customer satisfaction.
